name: Overcomplicated Turtle Game
description:
Little turtle wanted to become a golf ball. Unfortunately, he fell into a time machine that malfunctioned and took him to the adventure through iconic games from different eras. Help him fix his time machine and get back to the golf field.

Project from Gryfjam game jam.

Programming - Dima Shakhun, Mateusz Macutkiewicz, Maks "Grymbi" Kaniewski

Graphic design - Eden Trochimiuk, Sara Pejsak, Maks "Grymbi" Kaniewski

Design - Maks "Grymbi" Kaniewski, Sara Pejsak

Sound design - Eden Trochimiuk, Maks "Grymbi" Kaniewski
